answers.author: Jesse Himes
answers.text:
Hi Andrew,
Thanks for another great question!
I was able to find an article that may be of use to you. It provides a detailed description of how to “diagnose” your fiscal issues and how to determine what is working well or what needs improvement.
http://icma.org/en/results/home/news/Article/4425/Find_Your_Way_to_Fiscal_Health_and_Wellness
I hope this helps!
Jesse Himes, Knowledge Network Intern, jhimes@icma.org

author: Andrew Pederson
text: I am looking for examples of financial wellness/scorecards that evaluate the overall health of revenue, expenses, fund balances, etc. that you may produce on a monthly and annual basis for general fund, utilities, etc.  Looking for something that can be viewed by Board and public.
title: Financial wellness report/scorecard
